Class UIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • UIController
  • public class UIController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the program's user interface.

      changeScene method changes the window based on what the user clicks on.

      disconnect method disconnects the player and changes window to main menu window.

        start method starts the game.

        parent - reference to Appcontroller.

      • changeScene

        public void changeScene​(java.lang.Integer scene)
        changeScene method changes the window based on what the user clicks on.
        Parameters:
        scene - integer value of sceneEnum.

      • login

        public boolean login​(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
        login method checks if the login credentials are true or false.
        Parameters:
        username - player username.
        password - player password.
        Returns:
        true if login was successful. False if login was denied.

      • register

        public boolean register​(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
        register method checks if the new user created is valid or not.
        Parameters:
        username - new user name.
        password - new password.
        Returns:
        true if the username is available and password fits the requirements. False if username is taken and/or password meets the requirements.

      • getHighscores

        public Score[] getHighscores()
        getHighscores method fetches the top five best highscores.
        Returns:
        highscore.

      • getPersonalStats

        public int[] getPersonalStats()
        getPersonalStats method fetches a player's personal statistics.
        Returns:
        array with personal stats

      • joinLobby

        public boolean joinLobby​(Lobby lobby,
                         boolean isHost)
        joinLobby method connects an user to a lobby.
        Parameters:
        lobby - Lobby object of the lobby the user wants to join
        isHost - if the host user is the host or not. True = is host. False = not host.
        Returns:
        true if connection success. False if connection failure.

      • becomeHost

        public void becomeHost()
        becomeHost method makes a new player host if the current host leaves the game.

      • findLobbies

        public java.util.ArrayList<Lobby> findLobbies​(boolean prv)
        findLobbies method let's you see the available lobbies.
        Parameters:
        prv - if the lobby is private or not. True = private. False = public.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of available lobbies.

      • updatePlayerList

        public void updatePlayerList​(java.lang.String[] players)
        updatePlayerList method updates the player list inside the lobby.
        Parameters:
        players - players in the lobby.

      • gameStart

        public void gameStart()
        gameStart method starts the game and changes the window to the game window.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        disconnect method disconnects the player and changes window to main menu window.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String username,
                         int order)
        removePlayer method removes a player if they timeout during the game.
        Parameters:
        username - the player.
        order - in which order the player is in (player 1-4).

      • roll

        public void roll​(PlayerUpdate update)
        roll method rolls the dice.
        Parameters:
        update - updates the player after the roll.

      • onDiceRolled

        public void onDiceRolled​(PlayerUpdate update)
        onDiceRolled method runs an update when a player rolls a dice.
        Parameters:
        update - updates player.

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer​(PlayerUpdate update)
        movePlayer method moves the player to the new tile.
        Parameters:
        update - updates the player.

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver​(java.lang.String[] players)
        gameOver method shows the end screen with the game statistics.
        Parameters:
        players - array of the players in the game with stats.
